Main Camera_Triple: 48 MP, f/1.4-f/4.0, 24mm (wide), PDAF, Laser AF, OIS 48 MP, f/3.0, 90mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3.5x optical zoom 40 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), PDAF
Comms_Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)
Features_Sensors: Face ID, fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass, color spectrum
Battery_Charging: 88W wired, 100% in 30 min (advertised) 50W wireless 20W reverse wireless
Misc_Colors: Black, Red
